text: 2.5 Stt 6.1–7.24, 8.18, Hib 11.7, 1 Pi 3.20, 2 Pi 3.6 Pen binɨb bɨlel God nop kud ñɨl kɨdek ma gɨlak okok, kɨlop abe ma kelɨgak. Kɨlop gɨ tɨmel gek kul gɨlak. God gek man awl ak pakɨl ñɨg tan aplanek, mɨdupsek ñɨg ñɨbɨl kum dɨlak. Nowa pen, ne bɨ yɨpɨd gɨl gɨtep gɨl takaw agñak ak yek. God Nowa ayɨp, binɨb ne anep kugul ak ayɨp, kɨlop nep kod yek mɨdtep gɨlak.
